verses.1: Keʼn Topa ka bel hi. Bang hangin ka tungah, “Vasa leeng bangin mual tungah tai in;
verses.2: bang hang hiam cih leh, en in, migilote in khuamial sung panin lungsim thutangte a kap dingin a thalkhau uh ah thaltang bulhin a thal uh a keek uh hi.
verses.3: Bulpite kisusia khin leh midikte in bang cih thei nawn ding hiam?” nong ci thei diam?
verses.4: Topa a biakinn siangtho sungah om a, Topaʼ tokhom vantungah om hi. Amah in mihingte hong en a, mihingteʼ gamtatna khempeuh a thei tel hi.
verses.5: Topa in midikte le migilote en tel a, a ngongtat nuam mite a lungsim in mudah hi.
verses.6: Amah in migilote tungah mei-am le kaat zusak dinga, amauʼ ngah ding gimna huih sa mahmah hi ding hi.
verses.7: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa dik mahmah a, dik gamtatna a deih hi. Thutang mi in ama mai a mu ding hi.
